name: DELETED:7406 Avoid undocumented functions and procedures
description: Maintainability of the code is facilitated if there is documentation in the code. This rule will ensure there are comments within the Functions and Procedures.
output:
This report lists all Functions and procedures  with no documentation. It provides the following information: 
Function/Procedure Name, 
Function/Procedure Full Name
rationale:
Maintainability of the code is facilitated if there is documentation in the code. 
This rule will ensure there are comments within the Artifact,
remediation: Enrich Artifact code with meaningful comments
